channel.title: Compilers on Emmanuel Arias
channel.description: Recent content in Compilers on Emmanuel Arias

item.title: Source-to-source compilation with Lex-Yacc
item.description: In this post, I will describe a source-to-source compiler that transforms a Brainfuck program into its equivalent 64 bits assembly code. The assembly program can be built into a executable, thus allowing you to run Brainfuck programs natively.
